name: Palo Alto Panorama
description: Palo Alto Panorama project has assets for Create Security Rules, Install and Download Software, Create Security Pre or Post Rule, Standalone Software Upgrade, HA Pair Software Upgrade, Activate Firewall, Reboot Firewall, Suspend Firewall.
